title: ApogeeWest-Team
author: ApogeeWest-Team
content: Liquidating thousands of Nvidia and AMD GPU's.Large Offers Take Precedence: Seeking bulk offers (250qty min. order quantity)In person visits can be arranged and all other DD needed w/ multiple layers of transactional security applicable to the sale. (Escrow, company lawyer, 3rd party verification, warranty, expert consultation, conduct your DD process.)Ran in indoor filtered warehouse facility, GPU's had appropriate scheduled maintenance/cleaning.Custom made server boxes with filtration and fans.90 day warranty happily provided.If taking large lots then deduct 3% of the units for parts, backups etc. and then whatever beyond that becomes defective we can issue refunds or other GPU's as replacementsEverything is stored at a 3rd party logistics company, so can be verified independently for logistics ease. (in person visits still welcome)NVIDIA P102 GPU      3,136qtyAMD Vega 56 GPU     3,600qty  NVIDIA P104 GPU       840qty  NVIDIA 1070 GPU       500qty            Custom Built 8 port PCI6 Server  1,244qtyBring your strongest offers forward and let's make a deal.Reach out directly to us for inquiries

comments.author: ApogeeWest-Team
